answers.answer: It's a hormone in the placenta which causes your sugars to run high. And yes, it us controlled by diet
Ah ill be careful with the sugar then, thanks
You  can find carb smart ice cream bars. They are pretty good. I eat dare pleasure cookies too. They are a couple things I can eat on my gd diet.
I'm just trying to avoid it, I can't seen to get enough sweets and fruits lol don't wanna hurt myself or baby
I eat sweets kinda alot actually n diabetes runs iny family but nope! No gestational or regular diabetes here...as long as ur body produces enough insulin to eat up the sugar its fine.
Unfortunately you can't prevent it. Just like keiper said, it deals with your placenta and how it wants to process sugar. Eat all the fruit you want because you can't prevent it. :)
